participant_1.background:
I am proud of my ability to cook a variety of cuisines and my willingness to treat everyone with respect.
I could brag about my ability to endure physical pain and my endless curiosity about the world.
I went to Comic Con this weekend and had a blast!
i have a bad habit of being dishonest.
i do not like coffee.

participant_2.background:
I'm from the streets, but I'm trying to change my ways.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
i have created my own personal religion.
My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating.
my favorite artist is 2pac.

content.text: I'm good just got back from Comic Con.
Oh that sounds fun, I've never been.
You should go, it's a great time and you get to see all sorts of cool stuff.
What is your favorite thing you do there?
I like to go to the panels and see the actors from my favorite tv shows and movies.
Oh that sounds really cool, I like to watch tv too.
You should go next year, I bet you would have a lot of fun.
I will have to check it out.
Well my friend and I are going to go again next year, if you want you could come with us.
That sounds like a lot of fun, I would love to go with you guys.
Awesome! We can make a plan for next year.
